Package org.restsql.core

Contains core framework interfaces, an API for deployments that use restSQL as a library, rather than an HTTP service.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ColumnMetaData Encapsulates column (or field) metadata of an SQL Resource.
Factory.ConnectionFactory Creates JDBC connection objects.
Factory.RequestFactory Creates request objects.
Factory.RequestLoggerFactory Creates request loggers.
Factory.SqlResourceFactory Creates SQL Resource objects.
Request Represents a single CRUD request on a specific SQL Resource.
RequestLogger Logs request for troubleshooting applications.
SqlResource Represents an SQL Resource, an queryable and updatable database "view".
TableMetaData Encapsulates table information for an SQL Resource.
Trigger Provides a mechanism for executing non-trivial domain validation or business logic on all CRUD operations.
 

Class Summary
AbstractTrigger Contains no-op implementation of Trigger interface.
Config Loads properties from user-supplied file, defines property keys and defaults, and configures logging for framework.
Config.ImmutableProperties Wraps a java.util.Properties, exposing only the property getter.
Factory Facade for framework factories.
NameValuePair Encapsulates name and value for collections of request identifiers and parameters.
 

Enum Summary
Request.Type Represents request types, mapping to CRUD operations.
TableMetaData.TableRole Represents all of the roles a table may plan in a SQL Resource.
 

Exception Summary
Factory.SqlResourceFactoryException Indicates an error in creating a SQL Resource object from a definition.
InvalidRequestException Exception is thrown when a request does not meet expectations.
SqlResourceException Represents a restSQL error, typically wrapping an SQLException and adding an SQL String.
 

Package org.restsql.core Description

Contains core framework interfaces, an API for deployments that use restSQL as a library, rather than an HTTP service.
